entities.name: snape

entities.name: quirrell

entities.name: dumbledore

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the speaker and is being threatened by Quirrell.

relationships.description: Snape was trying to stop Quirrell from doing something.
Dumbledore was watching Harry Potter and preventing them from doing something.
Quirrell is threatening to kill Harry Potter.
